input.choice: Only failures (packet loss or high response time)
input.label: Result Filter

search.query: sourcetype="ping_input" | stats sparkline(avg(avg_ping)) as sparkline_ping avg(avg_ping) as ping max(max_ping) as max_ping latest(packet_loss) as packet_loss latest(_time) as last_checked range(avg_ping) as range min(avg_ping) as min by dest | search $result_filter$ | eval ping=round(ping, 0)." ms" | eval average=round(avg_ping, 0)." ms" | eval maximum=round(max_ping, 0)." ms" | eval range=round(min, 0)." - ".round(min+range, 0)." ms" | eval packet_loss=if(max_ping="NA",100,packet_loss) | table dest packet_loss last_checked ping max_ping range sparkline_ping | `timesince(last_checked,last_checked)` | sort -ping
